structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that contains information about the number of pages, size of each page, total number of pages and elements based on a provided `Pageable` object and a passed `Page` object. The `of()` method creates a new `PageInfo` object with the relevant metadata.

items.description: Is a data structure that encapsulates information about pages and elements in a query result. It provides the current page number, page limit, total pages, and total elements. The class uses Lombok to implement access modifiers and automatic creation of getters, setters, and toString methods.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Creates a `PageInfo` object containing information about a given pageable and page, including the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pageable information of the data being processed, providing the page number, page size, total pages, and total elements for the current page.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing its total elements and pages count to be used in calculating the page number and size for output.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing information about the current page of data.

items.name: of

structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that represents metadata about a page of results from a data source. The class has fields for the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements. A static method `of` creates an instance of `PageInfo` from a `Pageable` object and a `Page` object.

items.description: Is a data structure used to represent information about a page of elements. It consists of four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements. The class provides a convenient way to create instances of PageInfo from a Pageable object and its corresponding Page.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Returns a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements for a given `Pageable` and `Page`.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pageable object that contains information about the current page being processed, including the number of elements per page and the total number of pages in the dataset.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing the total number of elements on that page.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

items.name: of
